goal.ch:
黑格爾哲學體系一則總匯方西方哲學思想史中一切基本而重要的問題意識與解決構思，另則對其之攝納與批判開創出當代哲學潮流之主要方向與方法。欲學習西方哲學及思想史，必經黑格爾之哲學體系之關卡。而欲理解此史上最系統化又最歷史化之哲學體系，必須從其體系性思想之基本構思出發。本課程之主旨便在黑格爾哲思之生成發展脈絡開啟出其體系性哲思之構思思路。本課程首先揭示德意志觀念論之生成
脈絡，接著呈現其哲思如何從系統式思維、形上學實體典範以及傳統哲思方法轉向體系性思想，形上學精神典範及辯證法思路底基本構思之為一種對於神學問題及其解答之哲學性省思與構思，亦即一種神學哲學之玄思典範。此首先見於其哲學生成時期之德意志觀念論問題與省思，接著在其成名著《精神現象學》之構思，以及其被譽為史上最難解的經典《邏輯學》之玄思。本課程便需思想史地介紹黑格爾哲學之生成脈絡亦即德意志觀念論之生成發展，然後導讀《精神現象學》〈序言〉，並且以此作為《邏輯學》〈導論〉及〈序言〉之導論，以黑格爾玄思辯證法之為其神學哲學哲思方法為經，以其絕對精神觀念論之為其神學哲學核心思想為緯，最後主題意向性地與體系內在性地導向文本詮釋性導讀《邏輯學》之第一部分〈存有論〉之第一章〈存有作為學子淺嘗《邏輯學》之始。
goal.en: Hegel‘s philosophical system, on the one hand, sums up all the basic and important problem consciousness and -solving concepts in the history of Western philosophical ideas, and on the other hand, the incorporation and critics of this system create the main directions and methods of contemporary philosophical trends. In order to study Western philosophy and history of ideas, one must pass through Hegel’s system of philosophy. In order to understand the most systematic and historical philosophical system in history, it is necessary to start from the basic conception of its systemic thinking. In this course, we will focus on Hegel’s philosophical genesis and development, which has led us to the conceptualization of his systemic philosophizing. This course firstly reveals the genesis of German Idealism as background of Hegel’s thinking, and then shows how his philosophical thinking shifted from systematic thought, metaphysical paradigms of substance and traditional philosophical methods to systemic thinking, the metaphysical paradigm of spirit and dialectical way of thinking, which is basically conceived as a philosophical introspection and conceptualization of theological questions and their answers, i.e., as a paradigm for a philosophical metaphysics of theology. This process can be seen firstly in the problems and reflections of German  idealism during the period of his philosophical emergence, then in the conception of his famous work, Phenomenology of Spirit, and in the speculative philosophizing of the Science of Logic, which has been honoured as one of the most difficult classics of all time. Therefore this course introduces the history of Hegel’s philosophy, i.e. the genesis and development of the German Idealism and Hegel’s Philosophizing, and then introduces the “Preface” of the Phenomenology of Spirit, which serves as the introduction to the “Introduction” and “Preface” to the Science of Logic, and takes Hegel’s speculative dialectic as the philosophical method of his theological philosophy as the the vertical axis of thinking and his idea of absolute spirit as the core of his theological philosophy as the horizontal axis, and then the main theme intentionally and intrinsically leads to the textual interpretive reading of the first part of the Logic, the first chapter of the Doctrine of Being, the first chapter: Being, which serves as the beginning of the students’ first taste experience of the Science of Logic.

outline.ch:
1.導論I：體系性哲思導論
2.導論II:黑格爾哲學之為西方哲學史關鍵
3.導論III:黑格爾哲學之德意志觀念論脈絡
4.導論IV：黑格爾哲思生成史 – 玄思辯證法生成史
5.導論V：黑格爾哲學體系性要義：絕對精神觀念論及黑格爾哲學體系
6.《精神現象學》生成發展史：黑格爾哲學體系導論
7.《精神現象學》〈導論〉要義：意識之辯證性的經驗
8.《精神現象學》精義
9. 《精神現象學》〈序言〉本義：黑格爾邏輯學及體系基本構思
10. 實體與主體性精神之辯證關係
11. 辯證法精神：單純性與雙重性否定
12. 神性精神論：黑格爾對亞里斯多德Nous理論之觀念論轉化
13. 辯證法之語言問題：黑格爾思辨性語句論
14. 黑格爾對柏拉圖辯證法之批判性攝納
15. 黑格爾體系性哲學：現象學，邏輯學，哲學體系
16. 黑格爾哲學之效應歷史
開放性結論：黑格爾之體系性哲思
outline.en:
1. Introduction I: Introduction to Systemic Philosophizing
2. Introduction II: Hegel’s philosophy as the key to the history of Western philosophy
3. Introduction III: The context of German idealism of Hegel’s philosophy
4. Introduction IV: The genesis-history of Hegel’s philosophy – the genesis-history of speculative dialectics
5. Introduction V: Systematic Essentials of Hegel’s Philosophy: Absolute Spiritual Idealism and Hegel’s Philosophical System
6. History of the Genesis and Development of Phenomenology of Spirit as Introduction to Hegel’s Philosophical System
7. The “Introduction“ of Phenomenology of Spirit as the dialectical experience of consciousness
8. The essence meaning of Phenomenology of Spirit
9. The original meaning of Preface of Phenomenology of Spirit: Basic Concept of Hegel’s Logic and systemj
10. The dialectical relationship between substance and subjective spirit
11. The spirit of dialectics: simple negation and double negation
12. The theory of Divine Spirit: Hegel’s Conceptual Transformation of Aristotle’s Theory of Nous
13. The problem of language in dialectics: Hegel’s theory
of Speculative Sentence
14. Hegel‘s critical reception of Plato‘s dialectic
15. Hegel‘s systemic philosophy: phenomenology, logic, philosophical system
16. Open Conclusions: The effective history and systemic thinking of Hegel’s philosophy

flexDiscription.en: The two-week flexible teaching is augmented by audio-visual media teaching and students' participation in philosophy-related lectures at the Graduate Institute of Philosophy or the Institute of Hermeneutics and Intercultural Philosophy or the Centre for Human-Centred AI or the PPE programme.
